name: Exquisite Field Guide
description:
— What's this?

An excuse to learn how bipsi works with a collection of creatures I made after playing a round of Exquisite Biome. Go buy a copy yourself. It's great fun.

You're free to use these creatures and the biome location for anything. CC0.
